title: I'm thinking of writing a non-fiction novel. How should I start? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ok.. that's quite simple but a time consuming process..  Start with noting down all the main points you want to include there inPrepare notesWrite down attributes of main charactersPurpose of book is really important,  you should first decide it and decide your target readersStart expanding your notesStudy different novels of different genre,  just to figure out what you actually want And just write your heart out.. Feel and write..

I hesitated to even respond to this but there is no way to answer the question the way it is posed. The process for writing nonfiction is different from that for writing fiction. A novel, by definition, is fiction, therefore there can be no such thing as a “nonfiction novel.” Clarify your question and you might get some helpful answers.
